message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about we meet closer to the middle? This is my counter-offer.
I can do better than my first offer. How about we meet at 57-43?
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, but this is my final offer for anything above 50/50.
I'm not backing down. You're losing value each round, and I'm willing to take that into account. This is my new offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you a very reasonable deal.  Take it before inflation makes this whole thing pointless for both of us.
You're running out of time, Bob. Each round, your share is worth less. I'm willing to make a deal, but it's going to be on my terms.
